document.full_text: a u.s. trade panel has agreed to review eastman kodak co's claim that research in motion ltd and apple inc are infringing on its patents in a case that could mean hundreds of millions of dollars in royalties.
document.title: kodak wins skirmish against rim and apple
lines_and_colors: a u.s. trade panel has agreed to review eastman kodak co's claim that research in motion ltd and apple inc are infringing on its patents in a case that could mean hundreds of millions of dollars in royalties.
